mods.abstract: Image of a car decorated to commemorate Remembrance Day. The hood of the car has two signs with a poppy, an image of soldiers and a cross, and the caption "remember their sacrifice." Between the cards there is a model of a cemetery with crosses laying on a field of poppies taped to the hood of the car. On the front of the car are banners, one of which says "Lest We Forget" and hats and three flags: the Union Jack, the Canadian Maple Leaf, and the Ontario flag, attached to the front of the car. A poppy is attached to the inside of the windshield. People sit inside the car and many of the people on the street stare at it. The license plate number is 368 [I]7X.
mods.note: One negative (6-6A) scanned out of 13 in assignment
